verbose_text: The mechanism remains unknown, which is suggested to be an inflammatory response to the chronic Bb meningitis, impairing the CSF reabsorption in the arachnoid villi.3, 8 In pediatric literature, corticosteroids,9 therapeutic LP, VPs,9 and acetazolamide8, 10 have been suggested as supplementary treatments to AB of the Bb induced PTC.
